channel.title: Command help will rep!

item.title: Command help will rep!
item.dc:creator: @I_Am_Sparta I Am Sparta
item.description:
@I_Am_Sparta wrote:

Hey moparscape
I will rep++ if you help me
I just need to know how to make a command that takes away 50m but gives a rank like character-rights? Please help. Thanks!

This is what I have tried :S

if (playerCommand.startsWith("rankking") && c.item 995 >= 50000000) { c.character-rights = 12; c.item 995 -= 50000000; c.logout(); }

Read full topic
